name: (Version 2.5!!!) Simple 2D Platformer
description:
*Version 2.5 is out now!!! Level 4, Spikes, and more!!! If you have an older version (V1/V2) Delete it and get the newest version!!!*

A simple 2D platformer made with unreal. Assets are from the sunnyland asset pack, which is free. This game was made using cobra codes 2d unreal engine  5 video, so if you want to make something similar, watch his video.

Controls: Keyboard:

A = Left

D = Right

W / Spacebar = Jump

Enter = Reset

Controls: Contoller

Left Joystick = Move Left/Right

Bottom Face Button = Jump

Special Button Right = Reset
